summary: A new race i been working on, is still being added o and tweaked but is ready to be tested
descriptionHtml:
[size=20]This is a Female only race, as was requested on another site, hope you enjoy

Comes with custom Body meshes, own hooves meshes, Own Horn meshes, own tail meshes & its own skeleton & everything needed, it should work for almost any body type but i have not had chance to test completely, please let me know if there are any problems

Added SeveNBase TBBP & UNP Original body,meshes & textures, to use these instead of the default, Goto the optional folder inside the main Draenei Race Meshes & texture folder and copy and paste the contents of the SeveNBase TBBP or UNPO folders into the main Draenei Race folders, I am still working on UNPB just working out some problems with the meshes

Added horns based on original Draenei race mod from Oblivion and added a slight glow to them, Added new eye colours including a colour changing set depending on if you in the light or in a shadow, they are the red set of eyes

​Added a optional folder to he meshes, if you want the glowing hooves & horns just take the meshes from the optional folder and move to main mesh folder


If you dont like either of the included horns just delete the mesh of the one you dont like, for the red and black smaller horns delete Horns.nif, for he glowing blue horns delete Horns2.nif


Specials -

Aura Whisper Shout
Slow Time Shout

Spells -

AbDraenei - Your Draenei blood gives you <50>% resistance to Frost.
Power Nord Battle Cry

Skill Bonus

Archery - 10
Illusion - 5
Block - 5
Smithing - 10
Speech - 5
Destruction 5
Conujuration - 7

Starting Stats
Health - 75
Magicka - 90
Stamina - 70
Carry Weight - 400
Health Regen - 0.2000
Majicka Regen - 1.2000
Stamina Regen - 1.0000



C32[/size]

Changes

Version 0.9
Fixed reported problem where changing complexion reverted face back to default skin
Version 0.8
Added new set of horns based on Draenei mod for Oblivion but they have a slight glow,
added new eye colours including a colour changing set,
Tweaked the hoof meshes to look a better fit,
Version 0.7
Added Head & hand meshes to stop any seems on other body types
Added a preset so now you should get the glowing eyes to start with
added a couple of new preset hair colours
Version 0.6
Changed colour tone to a more subtle one
Version 0.5
Updated the powers and spells
author: Carloss32
